settings.heading: What is activated charcoal, and how does it work in toothpaste?
settings.row_content: Activated charcoal is a fine black powder that is highly absorbent. It helps remove surface stains and toxins from your teeth and gums.

settings.heading: What is n-Ha, and what are its benefits for teeth?
settings.row_content: Nano-hydroxyapatite (n-Ha) is a naturally occurring mineral that is the main component of tooth enamel. It helps to strengthen and rebuild enamel, reduce sensitivity, and promote overall oral health.

settings.heading: Is this toothpaste safe for daily use?
settings.row_content: Yes, our Charcoal Yuzu Mint Whitening n-Ha Toothpaste is safe for daily use. It has a low abrasivity rating of 72 and is formulated with gentle polishing agents to protect your enamel.

settings.heading: Can I use this toothpaste if I have sensitive teeth?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! n-Ha is known to help reduce tooth sensitivity, making this toothpaste a great choice for those with sensitive teeth.

settings.heading: Does this toothpaste contain fluoride?
settings.row_content: No, our toothpaste is fluoride-free. It utilizes n-Ha for remineralization and strengthening of teeth.

settings.heading: Is this toothpaste vegan and cruelty-free?
settings.row_content: Yes, our toothpaste is both vegan and cruelty-free. We do not use any animal-derived ingredients or test on animals.
